author: mount2010
comment: The ADEV MCQ and closed response was doable lah, would dare even say easy (array indexing, for loops, even variable assignment var x = 15 + 20, what is x?). The two open ended questions (3 and 7 marks each) I can agree is difficult, probably to separate the As and the Bs. The DBAV open ended required some join knowledge and knowledge of how the API boilerplate looks (but you should have revised this, so pure memorization).
